titles.title: Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2001
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to municipal deposits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

bill.summary: 5/17/2001--Introduced. Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to mandate that deposits of an in-State municipal depositor at an insured depository institution be insured in an aggregate amount not to exceed the total equity capital of the institution.
